'''Throne of Meower''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]]. It can be interacted with to play a cat petting minigame.

One copy of Throne of Meower is obtained from the [[Feline Fortress Furrdyssey]] event.

==How to Use==
# Interact with the throne to "Summon Cat"
# Choose a [[cat]] from the selection menu
#* Only cat breeds can be selected, not specific cats
#* Only cats currently present in the Main Building can be selected
#* The cat does not need to be in the same room as the throne
# Pet the cat
#* 8 locations: Both ears, both paws, face, upper body, lower body, tail
#* Different cats have different petting preferences, but there are no associated rewards or Friendship levels
